# mockaRoo
[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/stephlocke/mockaRoo.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/stephlocke/mockaRoo)
[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/coveralls/stephlocke/mockaRoo.svg)](https://coveralls.io/r/stephlocke/mockaRoo?branch=master)

Generate mock data with the [Mockaroo API](https://www.mockaroo.com/api/docs)

```{r results='hide', message=FALSE}
if(!require(devtools)) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("stephlocke/mockaRoo")
```

```{r tidy = TRUE}
library(mockaRoo)

basicSchema<-data.frame(
name = "blah"
, percentBlank = 0
, type = "Color"
)

response<-mockaroo("json"
 , list( key = "48b71860"
        , count = 10)
 , schema = jsonlite::toJSON(basicSchema)
)

jsonlite::prettify(response)
```
